hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.util

Class AsyncSubject<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.util.AsyncSubject<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the element type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseObserver, Observable<T>, Observer<T>, Subject<T,T>

    public class AsyncSubject<T>
extends Object
implements Subject<T,T>
    Represents the result (last value or exception) of an asynchronous operation delivered through observation.
    Since:
    0.97
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2013.01.10.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean done
      Indicator that the source finished.
      protected Throwable error
      The exception produced.
      protected boolean hasValue
      Indication that a value was produced.
      protected Lock lock
      The lock.
      protected Map<Closeable,Observer<? super T>> observers
      The map of registered observers.
      protected T value
      The last value produced.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AsyncSubject()
      Creates an AsyncSubject with a fair reentrant lock.
      AsyncSubject(Lock lock)
      Creates an AsyncSubject with the supplied lock.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void error(Throwable ex)
      An exception is received.
      void finish()
      No more values to expect.
      T get()
      Returns the result of the asynchronous operation, throws a RuntimeException if the operation had errors, or throws NoSuchElementException if no result was produced, waiting indefinitely if necessary.
      T get(long time, TimeUnit unit)
      Returns the result of the asynchronous operation, throws its exception, throws NoSuchElementException if no result was produced or throws TimeoutException in case of timeout, waiting at most the specified time.
      Option<T> getOption()
      Returns the results of the asynchronous operation in the form of an option, blocking and waiting indefinitely if necessary.
      Option<T> getOption(long time, TimeUnit unit)
      Returns the results of the asynchronous operation in the form of an option, waiting at most the supplied amount of time, returning null if timeout occurred.
      boolean isDone() 
      void next(T value)
      The next value is received.
      Closeable register(Observer<? super T> observer)
      Registers an observer for the notification of Ts.
      protected void unregister(Closeable c)
      Remove the registration of the observable identified by the closeable.

      • getOption

        @Nonnull
public Option<T> getOption()
                    throws InterruptedException
        Returns the results of the asynchronous operation in the form of an option, blocking and waiting indefinitely if necessary.
        Returns:
        the option value
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - in case the wait was interrupted

      • getOption

        @Nullable
public Option<T> getOption(long time,
                           @Nonnull
                           TimeUnit unit)
                    throws InterruptedException
        Returns the results of the asynchronous operation in the form of an option, waiting at most the supplied amount of time, returning null if timeout occurred.
        Parameters:
        time - the time value
        unit - the time unit
        Returns:
        the option value if the operation completed within time or null if timeout happened.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - in case the wait was interrupted

      • get

        public T get()
      throws InterruptedException
        Returns the result of the asynchronous operation, throws a RuntimeException if the operation had errors, or throws NoSuchElementException if no result was produced, waiting indefinitely if necessary.
        Returns:
        the result
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - in case the wait was interrupted

      • get

        public T get(long time,
    @Nonnull
    TimeUnit unit)
      throws InterruptedException,
             TimeoutException
        Returns the result of the asynchronous operation, throws its exception, throws NoSuchElementException if no result was produced or throws TimeoutException in case of timeout, waiting at most the specified time.
        Parameters:
        time - the time to wait
        unit - the time unit
        Returns:
        the result
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - in case the wait was interrupted
        TimeoutException - in case the wait timed out
